title: Boston Infra Builders Happy Hour with MongoDB & Step Function VC
description: Join us for an evening with fellow builders, founders, and technical leaders shaping the future of infrastructure. This gathering is a collaboration between MongoDB Ventures and Step Function VC‚Äîtwo investors focused on backing the next generation of infra startups. Whether you're scaling infra, building new primitives, or just getting started, this is a chance to connect with others in the Boston tech community who care deeply about the same things.
